resources.string: Did you come to play with me?
Come on, Sit down.
What is your name?
Mommy told me to not talk with strangers…
But mommy left me here, alone…
She even took my dolly, now I have nothing to play with..
Will you help me find my dolly?,
I’m grounded in this room.
I can\’t leave it.
i need you to help me find her.
I\’ve been grounded because I was a bad girl.
My doll is outside,
you just need to open the door,
we will hold hands and look for it together.
The door is protected with some kind of a spell,
you might find it in a description,
somewhere in the place you got me from.
Thank you, for letting me out,
We are gonna have a lots of fun together.
You are my play buddy for a whole straight 7 days
i\’ll give you 3 lives,
if you lie you lose
if you answer wrong you lose,
if you don\'t play you lose
and if you lose
YOUR. LIFE. WILL. BE. HELL.
Goodnight. See you tomorrow.
